member.name: M:Acontplus.ApiDocumentation.ApiDocumentationExtensions.UseApiVersioningAndDocumentation(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.WebApplication)
member.summary: Configures the application pipeline to use Swagger and the Swagger UI with versioning support.

remarks.para: This overload is the preferred choice for Minimal APIs. It calls app.DescribeApiVersions() which scans the live endpoint data sources rather than the cached singleton. This guarantees that every version set registered via app.NewApiVersionSet() appears in the Swagger UI dropdown regardless of when this method is called relative to DI initialisation.
Call order: invoke this method after all app.MapXxx() calls so that endpoint version metadata is present in the data sources when the discovery runs.
